title: The Negro Soldier (War, 1944) Stuart Heisler | Documentary

sources.title: The Negro Soldier (War, 1944) Stuart Heisler | Documentary
sources.description:
Documentary focusing on the contributions to the American war effort of African-American soldiers.

Director: Stuart Heisler (as Capt. Stuart Heisler)
Writer: Carlton Moss
Stars: Clyde Turner, Carlton Moss, William Broadus
Genres: Classics, Documentary, Drama, War


00:00 The struggle for liberty and equality in the face of Nazi ideology and the fight for American independence.
08:39 Struggle and triumph of African American soldiers in various wars and their lasting legacy.
18:05 Documentary showcasing the experiences of soldiers during wartime training and challenges.
24:53 Documentary highlights the training and diversity of American soldiers in World War II.
32:48 Diverse soldiers trained for war, emphasizing teamwork, determination, and readiness to defend their country.


@CultCinemaClassics
